name: BlitzPick
description: BlitzPick is building Immutable Repositories for Sports Bettors. XBP, BlitzPickâ€™s native token, will be used for staking, burning, and voting mechanisms throughout the platform. BlitzPick utilizes the power of blockchain technology to provide a platform for sports bettors featuring real-time market odds, data analytics tools, time-stamped predictions, and a suite of additional powerful features. With an extensive background in data visualization, the BlitzPick team will build models and data analytics tools and make them accessible to XBP token holders.
